TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 컬렉션 형식이 XAML 프로세서에서 중요한 공백인 것으로 처리되어야 한다는 것을 나타냅니다.

span.span: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `xml:space` XAML 처리의 공백에 영향을 주지만의 목적은 반대 되는 하는 관련된 개념 합니다.`xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of . 자세한 내용은 참조 [XAML의 공백 처리](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md)합니다.For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md). 이 클래스는.NET Framework의 이전 버전에서는 WPF 관련 WindowsBase 어셈블리에 존재합니다.In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], System.Xaml 어셈블리에 있습니다.In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 자세한 내용은 참조 [WPF에서 System.Xaml로 마이그레이션된 형식](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)합니다.For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 사용 정보WPF Usage Notes 한 예로 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 이 특성이 적용 되는 클래스입니다. is an example [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class where this attribute is applied.
